title: PIXMA G3000 - Wireless All-In-One
summary: Canon's first refillable ink tank system All-In-One wireless printer is designed for high-volume printing at low running cost. Also supports the new Canon PRINT Inkjet/SELPHY mobile printing app and PIXMA Cloud Link™.Print, Scan, CopyISO Standard print speed (A4): up to 8.8ipm (mono) / 5.0ipm (colour)Prints a 4 x 6” borderless photo in 60secs.
